Summary._: [3] train shuttle buses are detoured because of a crane operation on Livonia Av between Saratoga Av and E 98 St. Details at mta.info

Description._: [3] train shuttle buses are detoured because of a crane operation on Livonia Av between Saratoga Av and E 98 St. Details at mta.info

LongDescription:
[3] train shuttle buses are detoured because of a crane operation on Livonia Av between Saratoga Av and E 98 St.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound to Eastern Pkwy and Utica Av: Via Livonia Av, left on Saratoga Av, right on Riverdale Av, right on E 98 St, and then resume their regular route.

Eastbound to Livonia Ave and Ashford St: Via E 98 St, left on Riverdale Av, left on Thomas Boyland St, right on Livonia Av and then resume their regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made on Riverdale Av.

Summary._: Jamaica-bound [J] and Metropolitan Av-bound [M] train service has resumed following earlier switch problems at Myrtle Av.

LongDescription: Jamaica-bound [J] and Metropolitan Av-bound [M] train service has resumed following earlier switch problems at Myrtle Av.

TUNNEL RECONSTRUCTION | Until 12:01 AM, Sunday Jun 24, 2018
Weekend [2] [3] station closures and route changes

(including Monday, Memorial Day May 28)

Normal weekend service is scheduled to resume 12:01 AM Sunday, Jun 24, 2018.

No service at Park Place, Wall St, Clark St and Hoyt St; use nearby [4] [5] stations

No [2] [3] service between Manhattan and Brooklyn; take the [4] or [5] instead.

Free out-of system transfer is available between South Ferry [1] [2] and Bowling Green [4] [5].

Summary._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS  May 26 - 28, Sat to Mon

Description._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS  May 26 - 28, Sat to Mon

LongDescription:
STATION ENHANCEMENTS | May 26 - 28, Sat to Mon
Euclid Av-bound [C] trains skip 135, 116, 103, 96, 86 and 81 Sts in Manhattan


For 135 St, take the [A]* instead. Transfer between trains at 145 St or 125 St.

For service to 116, 103, 96, 86 and 81 Sts, take the [C] to 59 St-Columbus Circle and
transfer to an uptown [C].

For service from these stations, take the [C] to 125 St and transfer to a Euclid Av-bound [C].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

Alternate travel note:
Use nearby [1] stations instead; transfer between trains at 59 St-Columbus Circle.

Note: Cathedral Pkwy (110 St) and 72 St are closed for renovation.

Reminder: [C] trains do not operate overnight.

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | 11:45 PM Fri, May 25 to 5 AM Tue, May 29
World Trade Center-bound [E] trains skip Briarwood and 75 Av in Queens


For service to these stations, take the [E] to Union Tpke or 71 Av and transfer
to a Jamaica Center-bound [E], Jamaica-bound [F] or [R]*.

For service from Briarwood, take the [E] to Jamaica-Van Wyck, and transfer
to a World Trade Center-bound [E].

For service from 75 Av, take the [E] [F] or [R] to Union Tpke and transfer
to a World Trade Center-bound [E].

*[R] trains operate between 95 St and 71 Av and via the [F] to/from 179 St days and evenings.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  1145 PM Fri, May 25 to 5 AM Tue, May 29 Coney Island-bound [F] trains skip Sutphin Blvd, Briarwood and 75 Av

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  1145 PM Fri, May 25 to 5 AM Tue, May 29 Coney Island-bound [F] trains skip Sutphin Blvd, Briarwood and 75 Av

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | 11:45 PM Fri, May 25 to 5 AM Tue, May 29
Coney Island-bound [F] trains skip Sutphin Blvd, Briarwood and 75 Av in Queens


For service to Sutphin Blvd, take the [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F] or [R]*.

For service to Briarwood and 75 Av, take the [F] to Union Tpke or 71 Av
and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E], Jamaica-bound [F] or [R].

For service from Sutphin Blvd and Briarwood, take the [F] or [R] to Parsons Blvd
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

For service from 75 Av, take the [E] [F] or [R] to Union Tpke and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [F].

*[R] trains operate between 95 St and 71 Av and via the [F] to/from 179 St days and evenings.

Summary._: SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS  945 PM Fri, May 25 to 5 AM Tue, May 29 Bay Ridge-bound [R] trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St in Brooklyn

Description._: SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS  945 PM Fri, May 25 to 5 AM Tue, May 29 Bay Ridge-bound [R] trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St in Brooklyn

LongDescription:
SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS | 9:45 PM Fri, May 25 to 5 AM Tue, May 29
Bay Ridge-bound [R] trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St in Brooklyn


Trains stop at 36 St.

For service to Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av and 25 St, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a
local Manhattan-bound [F]* [N] or [R].

For service from these stations, take the [F] [N] or [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer
to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].

For service to 45 St and 53 St, take the [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [N] local or [R].

For service from these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].

*[F] trains replace the [D] in Brooklyn during this time.
